DOC.detailed_description: 90 systemically healthy subject divide randomly three group ( 30 subject group , per subject one site ) . Control group consist site treat OFD test group site treat OFD autologous PRF PRF SMV . Site-specific plaque index ( PI ) , sulcus bleed index ( mSBI ) , probe depth ( PD ) , relative attachment level ( RAL ) intrabony defect ( IBD ) depth reduction measure baseline 9 month surgery .
